title: Interval Timer
description: Build a repeatable workout or focus timer with warm-up, work, rest, and cool-down phases.
helper: Set the seconds for each phase, then start your interval routine.
empty: Add at least one phase to see the timeline.

errors.noDuration: Please set at least one phase duration above 0 seconds.

openGraph.title: Interval Timer
openGraph.description: Create interval routines for workouts, study sessions, or breathing exercises. Customize warm-up, work, rest, rounds, and cool-down in a clean mobile-friendly timer.
